#summary constant, which used to convert degrees into radians and all the way around

This constant is internally used by [jgenMath_rad2deg jgen.Math.rad2deg] and [jgenMath_deg2rad jgen.Math.deg2rad].

*Value:*
180 / Math.PI

*Example:*
{{{
// will return: 57.29577951308232
var iDegToRad = jgen.Math.DEG_TO_RAD;
}}}
